00023 template <typename T, typename U=typename boost::remove_const<T>::type,
00024           typename is_complex=typename boost::is_complex<U>::type,
00025           typename is_arithmetic=typename boost::is_arithmetic<U>::type> 
00026 struct NumericTraits {};
00027 
00029 template <typename T, typename U>
00030 struct NumericTraits<T,U,boost::false_type,boost::true_type> {
00031     typedef U Type;
00032     typedef boost::true_type IsReal;
00033     typedef U RealType;
00034     typedef std::complex<U> ComplexType;
00035     typedef U ParamType;
00036 
00037     static const int PRIORITY = sizeof(U)  + (sizeof(long long) * (!std::numeric_limits<U>::is_integer));
00038 };
00039 
00040 template <typename T, typename U>
00041 struct NumericTraits<T,U,boost::true_type,boost::false_type> {
00042     typedef U type;
00043     typedef boost::false_type IsReal;
00044     typedef typename U::value_type RealType;
00045     typedef U ComplexType;
00046     typedef U const & ParamType;
00047 
00048     static const int PRIORITY = NumericTraits<RealType>::PRIORITY;
00049 };
00051 
00056 template <typename T1, typename T2,
00057           bool winner=(NumericTraits<T1>::PRIORITY > NumericTraits<T2>::PRIORITY),
00058     bool is_complex=(NumericTraits<T1>::IsReal::value && NumericTraits<T2>::IsReal::value)
00059     >
00060 struct Promote {
00061 };
00062 
00064 
00065 // Real, T2 has priority
00066 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00067 struct Promote<T1,T2,false,true> {
00068     typedef typename NumericTraits<T2>::Type Type;
00069 };
00070 
00071 // Real, T1 has priority
00072 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00073 struct Promote<T1,T2,true,true> {
00074     typedef typename NumericTraits<T1>::Type Type;
00075 };
00076 
00077 // Complex, T2 has priority
00078 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00079 struct Promote<T1,T2,false,false> {
00080     typedef typename NumericTraits<T2>::ComplexType Type;
00081 };
00082 
00083 // Complex, T1 has priority
00084 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00085 struct Promote<T1,T2,true,false> {
00086     typedef typename NumericTraits<T1>::ComplexType Type;
00087 };

00091 namespace detail {
00092 
00101 template <typename T>
00102 struct SafeFloatingPointOps {
00103 
00104     static inline T divide(T a, T b) {
00105         if (b < static_cast<T>(1) && a > b*std::numeric_limits<T>::max())
00106             return std::numeric_limits<T>::max();
00107         if (a == static_cast<T>(0) || (b > static_cast<T>(1) && a < b*std::numeric_limits<T>::min()))
00108             return static_cast<T>(0);
00109         return a / b;
00110     }
00111 
00112     static inline T abs(T a) {
00113         return (a < static_cast<T>(0)) ? -a : a;
00114     }
00115 
00116 };
00117 
00118 } // namespace detail
00119 
00126 template <typename T1, typename T2=T1>
00127 struct ApproximatelyEqual {
00128     typedef T1 first_argument_type;
00129     typedef T2 second_argument_type;
00130     typedef bool result_type;
00131 
00132     typedef typename Promote<T1,T2>::Type Promoted;
00133     typedef detail::SafeFloatingPointOps<Promoted> Ops;
00134 
00135     result_type operator()(T1 a, T2 b) const {
00136         Promoted diff = Ops::abs(a - b);
00137         Promoted da = Ops::divide(diff,Ops::abs(a));
00138         Promoted db = Ops::divide(diff,Ops::abs(b));
00139         return db <= _tolerance && da <= _tolerance;
00140     }
00141 
00142     explicit ApproximatelyEqual(Promoted tolerance) : _tolerance(Ops::abs(tolerance)) {}
00143 
00144 private:
00145     Promoted _tolerance;
00146 };
00147 
00154 template <typename U1, typename U2>
00155 struct ApproximatelyEqual< std::complex<U1>, std::complex<U2> > {
00156     typedef std::complex<U1> first_argument_type;
00157     typedef std::complex<U2> second_argument_type;
00158     typedef bool result_type;
00159 
00160     typedef typename Promote<U1,U2>::Type Promoted;
00161 
00162     result_type operator()(std::complex<U1> const & a, std::complex<U2> const & b) const {
00163         return _real(a.real(),b.real()) && _real(a.imag(),b.imag());
00164     }
00165 
00166     explicit ApproximatelyEqual(Promoted tolerance) : _real(tolerance) {}
00167 
00168 private:
00169     ApproximatelyEqual<U1,U2> _real;
00170 };
